trans-unit.source: Represents a trigger that applies property values or performs actions when the bound data meet a set of conditions.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en utløser som gjelder egenskapsverdier eller utfører handlinger når bundne dataene oppfyller et sett med vilkår.

trans-unit.source: A MultiDataTrigger object is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>, except that the conditions of a MultiDataTrigger are based on property values of bound data instead of those of a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt for MultiDataTrigger ligner en <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>bortsett fra at betingelsene til en MultiDataTrigger er basert på egenskapsverdier bundne data i stedet for i <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>

trans-unit.source: In a MultiDataTrigger, a condition is met when the property value of the data item matches the specified <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: I en MultiDataTrigger er en betingelse oppfylt når egenskapsverdien for dataelementet samsvarer med den angitte <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then use setters or the <xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.EnterActions%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.ExitActions%2A> properties to apply changes or start actions when all of the conditions are met.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter bruke setters eller <xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.EnterActions%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.ExitActions%2A>egenskapene som skal bruke endringene eller starte handlinger når alle betingelsene oppfylles.</xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.ExitActions%2A> </xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.EnterActions%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger.Setters%2A> property of a MultiDataTrigger object can only consist of <xref:System.Windows.Setter> objects.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger.Setters%2A>egenskapen for et MultiDataTrigger-objekt kan bare bestå av <xref:System.Windows.Setter>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Setter> </xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger.Setters%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Setter> child to a MultiDataTrigger object implicitly adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection> for the MultiDataTrigger object.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en <xref:System.Windows.Setter>underordnede til et objekt for MultiDataTrigger implisitt legger den til den <xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection>for MultiDataTrigger-objektet.</xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Setter>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> objects are not supported; only <xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> supports <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter>objekter støttes ikke. bare <xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A?displayProperty=fullName>støtter <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> </xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.EventSetter>

trans-unit.source: For information about when to use triggers and when to use other techniques, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om å bruke utløsere når du bruker andre måter, kan du se [Data Templating oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Condition"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Condition"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: Changes to property values are applied when all the conditions in the collection are met.
trans-unit.target: Endringene til egenskapsverdiene brukes når alle betingelsene i samlingen er oppfylt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> object is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>, except that the conditions of a <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> are based on property values of bound data instead of those of a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>objektet ligner en <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>, bortsett fra at betingelsene til en <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>basert på egenskapsverdiene for bundne data i stedet for i <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> </xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger> </xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>, a condition is met when the property value of the data item matches the specified <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: I en <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>en betingelse er oppfylt når egenskapsverdien for dataelementet samsvarer med den angitte <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>

trans-unit.source: That value is first converted to the type of the value of the binding, if possible, and then the two values are compared using the `Object.Equals` method.
trans-unit.target: At verdien første konverteres til verditypen for bindingen, hvis det er mulig, og deretter to verdier sammenlignes ved hjelp av den `Object.Equals` metoden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger> applies the associated setters or actions when all of the conditions are true (binary `AND` operation).
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>gjelder tilknyttede setters eller handlinger, når regelens betingelser er oppfylt (binære `AND` operasjonen).</xref:System.Windows.MultiTrigger>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>, each condition in the collection must set both the <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Binding%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: For en <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>, betingelsene i samlingen må angi begge i <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Binding%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Condition.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Condition.Binding%2A> </xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Binding%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Condition.Binding%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Condition.Binding%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *zeroOrMoreConditions* Zero or more objects.
trans-unit.target: ## Bruk for egenskapen Element XAML ``` ``` ## XAML verdier *zeroOrMoreConditions* null eller flere objekter.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Condition"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: En samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Condition"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom samling.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref> objects that describe the property values to apply when all the conditions of the <xref href="System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger"></xref> are met.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"> </xref> objekter som beskriver egenskapsverdiene for å bruke når alle betingelser for den <xref href="System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger"> </xref> er oppfylt.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> enables you to start actions by using the <xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.EnterActions%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.ExitActions%2A> properties, or to set property values by using <xref:System.Windows.Setter> objects when the bound data meet a set of conditions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>gjør at du kan starte handlinger ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.EnterActions%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.ExitActions%2A>Egenskaper, eller angi verdier ved å bruke <xref:System.Windows.Setter>objekter når bundne dataene oppfyller betingelser.</xref:System.Windows.Setter> </xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.ExitActions%2A> </xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase.EnterActions%2A></xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>

trans-unit.source: If there are two <xref:System.Windows.Setter> objects in the same or different setter collections setting the same property, the <xref:System.Windows.Setter> that is declared last is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes to <xref:System.Windows.Setter>objekter i samme eller annen setter samlingene sette egenskapen samme den <xref:System.Windows.Setter>som er deklarert siste brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Setter> </xref:System.Windows.Setter>

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.Setter> child to a <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> object implicitly adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection> for the <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> object.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en <xref:System.Windows.Setter>barnet en <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>objektet implisitt legger den til den <xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection>for den <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> </xref:System.Windows.SetterBaseCollection> </xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> </xref:System.Windows.Setter>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> objects are not supported; only <xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> supports <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter>objekter støttes ikke. bare <xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A?displayProperty=fullName>støtter <xref:System.Windows.EventSetter>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.EventSetter> </xref:System.Windows.Style.Setters%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.EventSetter>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *zeroOrMoreSetters* Zero or more objects.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML egenskapen Element Bruk ``` ``` ## XAML verdier *zeroOrMoreSetters* null eller flere objekter.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: En samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Setter"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom samling.

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: Legger til et underordnet objekt.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> </xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: Det underordnede objektet til å legge til.

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: Legger til tekstinnhold i en node i objektet.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> </xref:System.Windows.MultiDataTrigger>

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: Teksten du vil legge til objektet.
